sentences.english: I had made a special pouch for her, red and green with white lace.
sentences.chinese: 我爲她做的小袋很特別，紅綠相間鑲着白邊。

sentences.english: At birth, the baby kangaroo lives in its mother's brood pouch.
sentences.chinese: 小袋鼠自從出生起就一直生活在媽媽的育兒袋裏。

sentences.english: Four little kangaroos bounced on the bed .
sentences.chinese: 四隻小袋鼠在牀上蹦蹦跳跳。

sentences.english: The nevirapine is contained in a small dropper placed inside the pouch.
sentences.chinese: 奈韋拉平是包含在這裏面的小袋放置了一個小滴管。

sentences.english: Fully embossed cover, 3 ribbon place markers and double expandable inner pocket.
sentences.chinese: 全封面壓印，3條絲帶書籤，兩層後頁小袋。

sentences.english: I had made a special pouch for her, red and GREen with white lace.
sentences.chinese: 我爲她做的小袋很非凡，紅綠相間還鑲着白邊。

sentences.english: The kangaroo mother allowed a peek inside her pouch for this picture.
sentences.chinese: 小袋鼠的母親允許攝影師拍攝它育兒袋中的小生命。
但是笨笨不害怕小袋鼠。

sentences.english: The joey lives there for about 8 months.
sentences.chinese: 小袋鼠叫朱宜，住在它媽媽的前袋裏。

sentences.english: She was worried about her Joey but wouldn't leave poor old Wombat.
sentences.chinese: 她很擔心小袋鼠，但又不能拋下老袋熊不管。

sentences.english: Wallabies were introduced from Australia and now they are wild in Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 小袋鼠產自澳大利亞，引進夏威夷成爲了野生品種。

sentences.english: Three little kangaroos hopped on the bed.
sentences.chinese: 三隻小袋鼠在牀上單腳跳。

sentences.english: You have a collection of minature shampoo bottles that you take every time you stay in a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在離開旅館時，你會把沒用完的小袋洗浴膏帶走。

sentences.english: The dingo slinks forward while the joey, unaware, keeps busy grooming himself.
sentences.chinese: 野狗悄悄向前，而不知情的小袋鼠仍在忙着梳理自己。

sentences.english: The mother and her joey make their getaway, too.
sentences.chinese: 母親和小袋鼠也開始逃跑。

sentences.english: Empty entire contents of 1 packet into cool food or drink. Mix until dissolved.
sentences.chinese: 將1小袋倒入涼的食品或是清涼飲料中攪伴直至消融。

definition: pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)
